entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @realDonaldTrump "in the pandemic you need strong institutions and professionals but this admin has fired and undermined them and put sycophants in charge with stable genius acting as an expert on everything" what a zoo and @GOP are responsible for this mess!
